articles.author: Bloomberg News
articles.title: Keystone pipeline is shut down after oil spills into creek in Kansas - BNN Bloomberg
articles.description: The shutdown of a key North American pipeline after an oil spill in Kansas roiled the flow of crude supplies across the US at a time when a fragile supply situation has rocked markets with volatility.
articles.content: The shutdown of a key North American pipeline after an oil spill in Kansas roiled the flow of crude supplies across the US at a time when a fragile supply situation has rocked markets with volatility… [+3604 chars]
